title: Consider the Purpose
text: Story frameworks are designed to help structure information in a logical way.

title: Think About Organization
text: Using a framework can assist in organizing thoughts before presenting.

title: Focus on Clarity
text: A clear message is often the result of a well-structured presentation.

title: Avoid Misconceptions
text: Frameworks do not eliminate creativity but rather support it.

hintAnswer: They help presenters organize their thoughts and convey a clear message.
title: Identify the Key Benefit
text: The key benefit of using story frameworks is that they help presenters organize their thoughts and convey a clear message.
choices: They help presenters organize their thoughts and convey a clear message.
They ensure that every presentation is exactly the same.
They eliminate the need for creativity in presentations.
They guarantee that the audience will always be engaged.
